title: Paris and Helen: Love That Launched a War
description: Learn Paris and Helen: Love That Launched a War in one minute.

hook.text: A face that launched a thousand ships. Helen's abduction by Paris triggered the most famous war in mythology.

buildup.text: Paris, prince of Troy, chose Aphrodite as the fairest goddess. His reward: Helen, the most beautiful woman alive.

discovery.text: Helen was already married to Menelaus, king of Sparta. Her departure sparked the ten-year Trojan War.

twist.text: Was Helen kidnapped or did she go willingly? Ancient sources disagree. Consent or captivity ‚Äî the debate haunts history.

climax.text: Troy burned, thousands died, and civilizations fell ‚Äî all traced back to one love affair between two people.

punchline.text: One love affair. Ten years of war. Troy fell for a romance.
